TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN TRAVELLERS <ATVC> EXPANDS OPERATIONS
TEXT.BODY: American Travellers Corp said its American Travellers Life Insurance Co unit has expanded its operations. The company said the unit has begun marketing in Maryland, Idaho and the District of Columbia. Reuter
